summary: This bill, the "Mission to Modernize Astronautic Resources for Space" or "Mission to MARS Act," proposes to appropriate $1,000,000,000 to the Administrator of NASA to improve infrastructure at the Johnson Space Center.  The funds will be allocated to various projects including upgrades to the Neutral Buoyancy Lab, Astromaterials Curation facility, Mission Control Center, Ellington Field, and other facilities.  Remaining funds after these projects are complete can be used to develop advanced space mission related systems.
